mods.abstract: We study charmonium production in hadron-nucleus collisions through the intermediate next-to-leading Fock space component \(<c(c)over bar>)(8)g], formed by a colour octet <c(c)over bar> pair and a gluon. We estimate the size of this state and show that its interaction with nucleons accounts for the observed charmonium suppression in nuclear interactions.
